IdeoPresetDef.label: Disciples of Harmony
IdeoPresetDef.description:
Blessed are those who follow the teachings of the Alicorn Goddesses.
<color=#FDF5FB>Celestia</color>, who told us to let the light of life shine from within us. <color=#373A77>Luna</color>, who told us not to let your mistakes define who you are. <color=#EBAFD1>Cadence</color>, who told us that love conquers all. <color=#D19FE4>Twilight</color>, who told us that friendship is eternal.
We are their disciples, and we will endeavour to spread their lessons across the land.

IdeoPresetDef.label: Cult of Chaos
IdeoPresetDef.description:
Harmony is for the weak; the Lord of Chaos is the one whose lessons we should be spreading.
(Please note: Howling at the moon and sleeping in the middle of a summer afternoon are optional.)
